entry.title: Graduation Research Presentation (2021)
entry.content:
Inoue Lab. students present Graduation Research about each following theme.

  • ABE Koki
    • UI for XR Based on Flick Input
  • ONO Tatsuya
    • A Person Tracking Method for Automated Shooting of Fancam
  • OBAYASHI Kyosuke
    • An XR User Interface for Agricultural Workers
  • HIROSE Kanako
    • Crop Growth Analysis Tool by Using Pseudo NDVI Images machine translation
  • MIYAZAKI Rikuto
    • Validating of Image Correction in Handwritten Character Recognition
entry.summary: Inoue Lab. students present Graduation Research about each following theme.

entry.title: 月刊高専にICLab.のインタビュー記事が掲載

link.title: 月刊高専にICLab.のインタビュー記事が掲載

entry.content:
メディア総研株式会社が運営する月刊高専にICLab.の活動についてのインタビュー記事が掲載されました．

ICLab.に集う「博士と天才」、地域産業の発展を目指して
前編
後編
entry.summary: メディア総研株式会社が運営する月刊高専にICLab.の活動についてのインタビュー記事が掲載されました． ICLab.に集う「博士と天才」、地域産業の発展を目指して 前編 後編

entry.title: ICLab. First Online Meeting
entry.content: ICLab.(Oita Kosen and Ariake Kosen) held first online meeting.

entry.title: Graduation Research Presentation (2020)
entry.content:
Inoue Lab. Students present Graduation Research about each following theme.

  • ISHII Syumpei
    • Video Streaming Assistance System using Card Recognition.
  • OGATA Sena
    • Fruit Ripeness Estimation using Convolutional Neural Network.
  • ONO Kazuyuki
    • A Study of Automated Scoring System using OCRCard Recognition from Characters in Trading Card Game.
  • SHIKANO Haruto
    • Examination of a dialogue system with a natural flow of conversation using machine translation.
  • HASHIMOTO Ryo
    • A Study of System for Extracting Go Stone Positions.
entry.summary: Inoue Lab. Students present Graduation Research about each following theme.

entry.title: Lab Tour
entry.content: Fifth-year students of the undergraduate course belong to our Lab presented their research to visitors from companies in Oita Prefecture.

entry.title: Invited Talk@APSCIT in Sapporo
entry.content:
Yusuke attended Asia Pacific Society for Computing and Information Technology (APSCIT) as an invited speaker in Sapporo, Japan.

  • Yusuke INOUE, Adaptive frame-rate control for low energy visual object tracking system, Jul. 2019, Sapporo.
entry.summary: Yusuke attended Asia Pacific Society for Computing and Information Technology (APSCIT) as an invited speaker in Sapporo, Japan.
